name: DENTAL_PROC_HX_ADDL_TOOTH
description: This table contains the history of the list of additional teeth associated with a dental procedure.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the procedure record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the history lines in the procedure record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the DENTAL_PROCEDURE_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple additional teeth associated with the procedure and the history line from the DENTAL_PROCEDURE_HX table.

columns.name: DENTAL_HX_ADDL_TOOTH_ID
columns.description: The audit trail of the additional teeth documented for a procedure.
